nodes.excerpt: Aviron is the high intensity version of Peloton for rowing; use the 22” touchscreen to browse 250+ workouts like competitive games and live races with friends. High intensity workouts are short, improve cognitive ability and help slow the aging process.

localize.description: Aviron是划船运动的Peloton的高强度版本；使用22英寸触摸屏浏览250+训练，如竞技游戏和与朋友的现场比赛。高强度锻炼时间短，提高认知能力，有助于延缓衰老。
localize.tagline: 划船用高强度版本的Peloton。

localize.tagline: 划船用高強度版本的Peloton。

nodes.excerpt: Soundescape is a free web application for ambient background sounds. If you struggle to concentrate while working from home, this tool is for you! Audio is rendered in 3D, and you'll never hear the exact same combination of audio twice, as everything is generated randomly.
nodes.title: Soundescape - Generative 3D audio environments for focused work
nodes.author: Maximilian Torggler

localize.description: Soundescape是一款免费的环境背景音网络应用。如果你在家工作时难以集中精力，这个工具就是为你准备的。音频是以3D形式呈现的，你永远不会听到两次完全相同的音频组合，因为一切都是随机生成的。
localize.tagline: 专注工作的生成式3D音频环境

localize.description: Soundescape是一款免費的環境背景音網絡應用。如果你在家工作時難以集中精力，這個工具就是爲你準備的。音頻是以3D形式呈現的，你永遠不會聽到兩次完全相同的音頻組合，因爲一切都是隨機生成的。
localize.tagline: 專注工作的生成式3D音頻環境

nodes.excerpt: The YouTuber ATM machine. Creator Cash allows you to access YouTube earnings immediately. No more waiting an entire month to get paid. Uploaded a video today? Get paid today! Coupled with earnings analytics, Creator Cash is the financial hub for YouTubers.

localize.description: 优德娱乐场w88提款机。Creator Cash 允许您立即获得 YouTube 收入。不再需要等待整整一个月才能获得报酬。今天上传了一个视频？今天就可以获得报酬 结合收益分析，Creator Cash 是 YouTubers 的财务中心。
localize.tagline: 创作者无需等待就能获得报酬的应用。

nodes.excerpt: Once help you limit the time spent on distracting websites, encouraging focus, and mindfulness. Once lets you visit these websites once per hour. The timer starts when you close the tab of one of these websites and only applies it to the homepages.
nodes.title: Once - Stop wasting time on websites that don't make you happy
nodes.author: Youcef Es-skouri

localize.description: Once hilft Ihnen, die Zeit zu begrenzen, die Sie auf ablenkenden Websites verbringen, und fördert die Konzentration und Achtsamkeit. Mit Once können Sie diese Websites einmal pro Stunde besuchen. Der Timer startet, wenn Sie die Registerkarte einer dieser Websites schließen, und gilt nur für die Homepages.
localize.tagline: 不要再把时间浪费在那些不能让你快乐的网站上。
